attributes.action: Call for the resignation of the Prime Minister because he broke the law
attributes.additional_details: It is disgraceful that he should be allowed to continue to embarrass the country by being Prime Minister. The country needs to be governed by a law abiding and honest person
attributes.background: We cannot have a serving Prime Minister who has been proven to have broken his own laws. We want the Prime Minister to resign and leave Public Office

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
